Name: Electron affinity
Description: This type is holds information about the electron affinity of elements (and potentially of molecules), along with the degree of uncertainty of that measurement, in electronvolts.

Properties.Name: Value
Properties.Description: The electron affinity of this element or molecule

Properties.Name: Uncertainty
Properties.Description: The degree of uncertainty of this measurement. Enter the expanded value of the uncertainty: e.g., 0.0005 rather than just 5.
